titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the American Legion (Washington State) Annual Convention Souvenirs 1938-1950
American Legion (Washington State) annual convention souvenirs
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Darcie Hart Riedner

publicationstmt.publisher: Washington State University Libraries Manuscripts, Archives, and Special Collections

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2013-11-25T13:29-0800

did.unittitle: American Legion (Washington State) Annual Convention Souvenirs

repository.corpname: Washington State University Libraries, Manuscripts, Archives, and Special Collections

did.abstract: This collection consists of souvenirs from the Washington State American Legion annual conventions, 1938-1950.

accessrestrict.p: This collection is open and available for research use.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection includes souvenirs from annual Washington State American Legion conventions in the years 1938, 1939, 1941 and 1950. The nine souvenir items include convention programs from 1938 and 1950, a guest ticket book from 1938 and convention badges from 1938, 1939, 1941 and 1950 with cover letters.

acqinfo.p: This collection was donated to the Washington State University Libraries by Herman Deutsch (VF 38).

prefercite.p: [Item description] American Legion (Washington State) annual convention souvenirs, 1938-1950
Manuscripts, Archives, and Special Collections Washington State University Libraries Pullman, WA

odd.head: General note
odd.p: This donor of this collection, Herman Deutsch, was a professor of History at Washington State University from 1926-1962.
